lava module¶

class core.LavaBase(n_y, n_u_phi, n_u_gamma, n_u_binary, n_a, n_b, n_c, n_d, M, L, L_vec_u, L_vec_y)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base LAVA model that is inherited for using different base functions for latent variable model.

Parameters

  • n_y (int) – \(n_y\) - Number of outputs

  • n_u_phi (int) – \(n_{u,\phi}\) - Number of inputs to nominal model

  • n_u_gamma (int) – \(n_{u,\phi}\) - Number of continuous inputs to latent variable model

  • n_u_binary (int) – \(n_{u,binary}\) - Number of binary inputs to latent variable model

  • n_a (int) – \(n_a\) - Order of nominal model (number of output lags)

  • n_b (int) – \(n_b\) - Order of nominal model (number of input lags)

  • n_c (int) – \(n_c\) - Order of latent variable model (number of output lags)

  • n_d (int) – \(n_d\) - Order of latent variable model (number of input lags)

  • M – \(M\) - Resolution of basis function

  • L – \(L\) - Resolution of basis function

  • L_vec_u – \(L_u\) - (u_max - u_min) of inputs

  • L_vec_y – \(L_y\) - (y_max - y_min) of outputs

forecast(u_phi, u_gamma, u_binary)[source]¶

Forecast for the length of the input vector.

forecast_step(u_phi, u_gamma, u_binary)[source]¶

Perform one step ahead forecast.

reset_id()[source]¶

Resets identification parameters to default values.

Variables

  • n (int) – Number of steps performed

  • Psi – \(\Psi\) - Matrix of products of inputs and outputs \(\phi\phi, \gamma\gamma, yy, \phi\gamma, \phi y, \gamma y\)

  • Z – \(Z\) - Latent parameter model matrix

  • Theta_bar – \(\overline{\Theta}\) - Intermediate nominal model parameter matrix

  • P – \(P\) - Covariance matrix for recursive least squares estimation for nominal model parameters

  • H – \(H\) - Regression matrix for recursive least squares estimation for nominal model parameters

reset_var()[source]¶

Resets input variables matrices.

step(y, u_phi, u_gamma, u_binary)[source]¶

Performs one estimation step:

Parameters

  • y – \(y\) - Outputs of model

  • phi – \(\phi\) - Inputs to nominal model

  • gamma – \(\gamma\) - Inputs to latent variable model

  • Update vector of products of inputs and outputs \(\Psi\)

  • Update covariance matrix \(P\)

  • Update regression matrix \(H\)

  • Update matrix of parameters for nominal model \(\overline{\Theta}\)

  • Update matrix of parameters for latent variable model \(Z\)

class core.LavaLaplace(n_y, n_u_phi, n_u_gamma, n_u_binary, n_a, n_b, n_c, n_d, M, L, L_vec_u, L_vec_y)[source]¶

Bases: core.LavaBase

LAVA model using ARX nominal model and a nonlinear Laplace base function.

class core.LavaLinearFourier(n_y, n_u_phi, n_u_gamma, n_u_binary, n_a, n_b, n_c, n_d, M, L, L_vec_u, L_vec_y)[source]¶

Bases: core.LavaBase

LAVA model using ARX nominal model and Fourier base functions.

Nonlinear system¶

Example of nonlinear system identified using LAVA-R and nonlinear Laplace basis functions.

Time series¶

Example of periodic time series identified using LAVA-R and Fourier basis function, with separate inputs to the nominal and lava model respectively.
